name: polkadot-agent-kit-examples
description: Example scripts for Polkadot Agent Kit 2.0

scripts.test:firecrawl: tsx firecrawl.test.ts 2>&1 | grep -v '@polkadot' | grep -v 'Either remove' | grep -v 'conflicting packages' | grep -v 'esm\|cjs' | grep -v 'node_modules' || true
scripts.test:a2a: tsx a2a.test.ts 2>&1 | grep -v '@polkadot' | grep -v 'Either remove' | grep -v 'conflicting packages' | grep -v 'esm\|cjs' | grep -v 'node_modules' || true
scripts.test:intent: tsx intent.test.ts 2>&1 | grep -v '@polkadot' | grep -v 'Either remove' | grep -v 'conflicting packages' | grep -v 'esm\|cjs' | grep -v 'node_modules' || true
scripts.test:all: pnpm run test:firecrawl && pnpm run test:a2a && pnpm run test:intent
